@about_android.message: ScriptFilter is also available on Firefox Android.

@about_github.message: ScriptFilter is open source ! You can contribute, add a translation or report any issue on

@about_review.message: If you like this add-on, please send a comment on

@blacklist_text.message: CSP is applied if the domain url of a visited page matches the following list. You can add domain urls with wildcards "*" and "?" such as "www.ex?mple.*".

@contextmenu_link.message: Open link in new tab with CSP

@csp_enable.message: Enable : Resources are loaded as normal.

@csp_restrict.message: Restrict : External resources and unsafe inline resources are blocked.

@csp_text.message: Enable, restrict or disable the following resources from a website when you click on the action button by applying Content Security Policy (CSP). You will need to reload tabs in order to see CSP modifications.

@file_clear2.message: Removes all domain urls from the blacklist.

@file_export2.message: Download the domain blacklist as file...

@file_import2.message: Add domains from text file (.txt) or Excel file (.csv).

@manifest_description.message: Blocks scripts and resources from a website with Content Security Policy.

@mode_text1.message: When I click on the action button, apply Content Security Policy to :

@mode_text2.message: The domain blacklist is activated if current domain is selected.

@msg_already_exists.message: The domain url already exists in the blacklist !

@msg_invalid_chars.message: The domain url contains unexpected characters !

@msg_invalid_filecontent.message: Import failed : Unexpected characters found at line

@msg_invalid_fileext.message: Import failed : Please select a .txt or .csv file !

@options_contextmenu.message: Add ScriptFilter to the browser context menu :

@options_autoaddurl.message: When I switch CSP ON to current domain, add automatically the domain url to blacklist :

@options_autodelurl.message: When I switch CSP OFF to current domain, remove automatically the domain url from blacklist :
